metadata.title: CVE-2022-31144 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. A specially crafted`XAUTOCLAIM` command on a stream key in a specific state may result withheap overflow, and potentially remote code execution. This problem affectsversions on the 7.x branch prior to 7.0.4. The patch is released in version7.0.4.

criterions.comment: redis package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
